title: 多世界无法使用地狱门
author: 贱男春
txt_content:
只有主世界可以使用
下面是多世界config配置
  enforceaccess: 'false'
  prefixchat: 'true'
  prefixchatformat: '[%world%]%chat%'
  useasyncchat: 'true'
  teleportintercept: 'true'
  firstspawnoverride: 'true'
  displaypermerrors: 'true'
  globaldebug: '0'
  silentstart: 'false'
  messagecooldown: '5000'
  version: '2.9'
  firstspawnworld: world
  teleportcooldown: '1000'
  defaultportalsearch: 'false'
  portalsearchradius: '128'
下面是worlds配置
SC:
    ==: MVWorld
    hidden: 'false'
    alias: '&d生存'
    color: WHITE
    style: NORMAL
    pvp: 'false'
    scale: '1.0'
    respawnWorld: ''
    allowWeather: 'true'
    difficulty: NORMAL
    spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
      animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
      monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
    entryfee:
      ==: MVEntryFee
      amount: '0.0'
      currency: '-1'
    hunger: 'true'
    autoHeal: 'true'
    adjustSpawn: 'true'
    portalForm: ALL
    gameMode: SURVIVAL
    keepSpawnInMemory: 'true'
    spawnLocation:
      ==: MVSpawnLocation
      yaw: -90.89371
      pitch: 2.3999949
      z: 220.44437834397448
      y: 66.0
      x: 64.21271950135262
    autoLoad: 'true'
    bedRespawn: 'true'
    worldBlacklist: []
    environment: NORMAL
    seed: '1609876662957023800'
    generator: 'null'
    playerLimit: '-1'
    allowFlight: 'true'
我觉得应该不是这个问题
大神求解答

replies.author: ak1115284886
replies.txt_content: 输入/mv modify set  portalform nether 世界名
多世界默认新的普通世界是不能开启新地狱和末地的，不然就乱套了

replies.author: wuchan
replies.txt_content: 重新把新版本的换到那里去得了
